Content: The 5th phase of the Security Force Headquarters-West (SFHQ-West)-initiated IT course, conducted by Orient Academy ended with award of certificates and medals on Monday (30). Brigadier J. Thanthiriwaththa, Brigadier General Staff at SFHQ-West representing SF-West Commander gave away certificates and medals. 30 other ranks serving all units in the SFHQ-West followed this course, held under 5 phases.
